title: 25 dead after bus catches fire in India: police
description: Twenty-five passengers were killed and eight injured when a bus carrying 33 people burst into flames on an expressway in western Indian state of Maharashtra's Buldhana district today, police said.

title: Increased travel tax collection begins at Benapole Land Port
description: Benapole Land Port authorities today started collecting the increased travel tax announced in the budget for 2023-24 FY. India-bound passengers using the land port are having to pay Tk 1,000 as travel tax, reports our local correspondent. Previously they had to pay Tk 500.

title: Australia stifle Stokes heroics at Lord's to take 2-0 Ashes lead
description: England captain Ben Stokes' swashbuckling 155 was in vain as Australia won the second Ashes test at Lord's by 43 runs on an extraordinary final day on Sunday to take a 2-0 lead in the five-test series.

title: West Indies miss out on World Cup after Scotland loss
description: Two-time winners West Indies will not play in the 50-over Cricket World Cup for the first time after a comprehensive seven-wicket loss to Scotland in their Super Six clash at the qualification tournament in Zimbabwe on Saturday.

title: The battle of Byomkesh: Dev and Anirban Bhattacharya in fierce face-off
description: The anticipation among Bengali audiences for Sharadindu Bandyopadhyay's celebrated novel 'Durgo Rahasya' continues to grow as two directors, Birsa Dasgupta and Srijit Mukherji, have recently wrapped up filming a movie and a web series based on the iconic detective character, Byomkesh Bakshi.

title: Arnob and Arijit Singh together
description: After a long time, Shayan Chowdhury Arnob and Arijit Singh met with each other in Murshidabad, India. Arnob took to his social media posting a picture of the two in a friendly pose. He wrote, 'Finally! Look Who's here? We met after such a long time.'

title: Jack Ma makes surprise visit to Dhaka
description: In a series of surprise visits, Jack Ma, the co-founder of Alibaba, made a brief stopover in Dhaka, Bangladesh, before heading to Kathmandu, Nepal on Tuesday, June 27. In Dhaka, Jack Ma stayed at a prominent five-star hotel in Gulshan. These unexpected visits by the prominent Chinese entrepreneur have sparked curiosity and speculation in the industry. Industry observers in Bangladesh, Nepal, and Pakistan have been abuzz with rumours about the purpose behind these discreet travels.

title: WhatsApp Business can now send ads directly to FB & Insta users
description: WhatsApp Business, owned by Meta, has recently rolled out an update aimed at enhancing business outreach and facilitating seamless communication with customers. The application has introduced features that make it simpler for business owners to connect with their clientele on Facebook and Instagram.
